frame.name: Getting_triggered
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>System</fen> interacts with the environment (which may include a volitional agent) and goes into operation in accordance with its intended purpose.
<ex><fex name="System">The alarm</fex> <t>went off</t> <fex name="tim">as she walked through the entrance</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="System">The bomb</fex> must have <t>triggered</t> accidentally.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: System
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>System</fen> interacts with the environment and activates.
<ex><fex name="sys">The device</fex> <t>triggered</t> as she walked through the arch.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any holistic description of the event, including overall depictions (<ment>the same way</ment>) and descriptions pertaining to the <fen>System</fen> (<m>quietly</m>).</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>Where the <fen>System</fen> goes off.
<ex>Police came running downstairs when the metal detector <t>went off</t> <fex name="pla">at the county courthouse</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>System</fen> triggers.
<ex>The alarm <t>went off</t> <fex name="tim">at three o'clock today</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition:
<def-root>The number of times the triggerent event occurs in a particular time period.
<ex>Around here bombs <t>go off</t> <fex name="fre">several times a day</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: trigger.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: become active after interacting with the environment.
